attributes.action: A General election should be held immediately.
attributes.additional_details:
We need cohesion, stability and a Government that will stand for the people. A government that is elected for the next few years on the basis of a public vote. Not a new priminister who is chosen by the few.

The future elected will be elected fairly, let the public decide and restore stability to the United Kingdom. 

Let us the British people choose our own future, let us hear and decide why we should vote for those who will stand. We need to be given the democratic choice.
attributes.background: A General Election should be held immediately. Boris Johnson and the Conservative government were voted in fair and square in the last election. Circumstances have led to the UK becoming a laughing stock on the global stage.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
